Great staff beautiful view and very good facilities

1: The hotel is great but the staff are rude and abrupt a great shame as this could be a fab place but the staff badly let it down
I looked at a coffee machine in the middle of the bar area and was shouted at by one of the staff as apparently it was for some seminar
Service is key when you want to position your self and my experience there has been very poor on this matter beside some individuals whom try to full fill gaps
Room service appears and they had forgotten half the order

Staff was consistently unwelcoming bored and inattentive during our weekend stay here and the room price was exorbitant for the quality of the accommodations we had since rooms are very small with tiny bathrooms
The only polite service came from the chefs in the restaurant at breakfast

As soon as we arrived no welcoming message but the receptionist demanded my credit card for a € 50 deposit in case of breakages we had booked one of the top bedrooms in the hotelWe were told that we had free minibar
I stopped at reception when we checked out and spoke to Mateo who was the 1st person to show me courtesy
